ScopedSyncMode Class Reference

This class is used to turn on/off sync mode of the ChunkManager in a scoped fashion. More...

#include <chunk_manager.hpp>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 ScopedSyncMode ()
 This constructor adds one to the synced mode reference count.
 ~ScopedSyncMode ()
 This destructor decreases the synced mode reference count by one.

Detailed Description

This class is used to turn on/off sync mode of the ChunkManager in a scoped fashion.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ScopedSyncMode::ScopedSyncMode (  ) 

This constructor adds one to the synced mode reference count.

ScopedSyncMode::~ScopedSyncMode (  ) 

This destructor decreases the synced mode reference count by one.
